title: AMERICAN GODS Season 2 Episode 2 Breakdown & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: Who is Shadow? Hit me with those theories!
I don't think Shadow's mother is a god. I think she is one of many mortals that the gods, especially Odin are known for seducing.

I love Shadow's mother or how the show and the actress portrayed her as a kind and wise woman yet very vulnerable.I can't remember reading about her in the book but  she is full of wisdom and I can see how she attracted Odin. 😍
Woah that scene with the horde, no one would’ve caught that part when were naked. Nice catch. I’m reading the book now because this show is playing with my emotions

I too suspect Shadow is a demigod and the son of Wednesday, but I had no idea about the god of liberty angle so excellent theory on that one it sounds very plausible and keeping with the show's mythology.
description:
We breakdown season 2 episode 2 of American Gods "The Beguiling Man" and explore its mythology and hidden details!
